task.title: Rollback to a snapshot
task.shortdesc: You can rollback your application to a previous state that existed when you took a snapshot. Rollbacks can only be performed on the CLI.

taskbody.prereq: You must stop the services that are used by the image when the snapshot was taken. The distributed file system will also be rolled back to the state that existed when the snapshot was taken.
taskbody.context: To rollback to a snapshot, you must know the SNAPSHOTID.

step.cmd: Log in to the host as a user with sudo and docker privileges.
Find the SNAPSHOTID of the snapshot to which you want to rollback.
Rollback to the snapshot. Using the --force-restart flag automatically stops the affected services before rollback and starts them after completion.
